  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1031</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Animal Rights</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tierrechte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Droits des animaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Direitas Animais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Diritti Animali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζωικά δικαιώματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las Derechas Animales</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this activity learners will learn about animal rights and how animals are used to test household products and cosmetics. In pairs or groups they will investigate companies that are or are not using animals to test their products.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">animal rights</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">animal testing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">animal experiments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interactive activity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Aktivität erlernen Anfänger über 
Tierrechte und wie Tiere benutzt werden, um Haushalt Produkte und 
Kosmetik zu prüfen. In den Paaren oder in den Gruppen forschen 
sie Firmen nach, die sind oder nicht Tiere benutzen, um ihre Produkte 
zu prüfen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette activité les étudiants se 
renseigneront sur les droits des animaux et comment des animaux sont 
employés pour tester des produits et des produits de beauté de 
ménage. Dans les paires ou les groupes ils étudieront les 
compagnies qui sont ou n'emploient pas des animaux pour tester leurs 
produits.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta atividade os learners aprenderão sobre as 
direitas animais e como os animais são usados testar produtos e 
cosméticos da casa. Em pares ou grupos investigarão as 
companhias que são ou não estão usando animais testar seus 
produtos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa attività principianti impareranno 
circa i diritti animali e come gli animali sono usati per esaminare i 
prodotti e le estetiche della famiglia. Negli accoppiamenti o 
nei gruppi studieranno le aziende che sono o non stanno usando gli 
animali per esaminare i loro prodotti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την δραστηριότητα οι αρχάριοι θα μάθουν για 
τα ζωικά δικαιώματα και πώς τα ζώα χρησιμοποιούνται για να 
εξετάσουν τα οικιακά προϊόντα και τα καλλυντικά. Ανά τα 
ζευγάρια ή τις ομάδες θα ερευνήσουν τις επιχειρήσεις που είναι 
ή δεν χρησιμοποιούν τα ζώα για να εξετάσουν τα προϊόντα τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta actividad los principiantes aprenderán 
sobre las derechas animales y cómo los animales se utilizan para 
probar productos y los cosméticos de la casa. En pares o grupos
investigarán a compañías que son o no están utilizando animales 
para probar sus productos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tierrechte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tierprüfung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tierexperimente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktive Aktivität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">test animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">activité interactive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
